attacks.name: Hover Hit
attacks.effect: The Retreat Cost for the Defending Pokémon is 0 until the end of your next turn.

attacks.name: Crash Bomber
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon has any Special Energy cards attached to it, this attack does 20 damage plus 40 more damage. Then, discard a Special Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.
